description: What are you reading for fun right now?
title: Spring Books
title_page: Spring Books - The New York Times
maintext:
Do you like to read in your spare time? Do you prefer fiction or nonfiction? What kinds of stories do you like best? Is there something you’ve read recently that you’d recommend to others your age?
The Times has published a list of 22 works of fiction coming this spring. On the list are reality-bending explorations of time and space, a Western horror novel, and a debut novel from actor Tom Hanks. Which of those, if any, sound appealing to you?
Tell us in the comments, then read the related article to learn more.
Students 13 and older in the United States and Britain, and 16 and older elsewhere, are invited to comment. All comments are moderated by the Learning Network staff, but please keep in mind that once your comment is accepted, it will be made public and may appear in print.
